subtitles.name: Past continuous tense
subtitles.example: I was reading when she arrived.

subtitles.name: Present perfect continuous
subtitles.example: I have been living here for years.

subtitles.name: Past perfect
subtitles.example: We had been to see her several times before she visited us.

subtitles.name: Past perfect continuous
subtitles.example: He had been watching her for some time when she turned and smiled.

subtitles.name: Future perfect
subtitles.example: We will have arrived in the States by the time you get this letter.

subtitles.name: Future perfect continuous
subtitles.example: By the end of your course, you will have been studying for five years.

subtitles.name: Simple future tense
subtitles.example: They will go to Italy next week.

subtitles.name: Future continuous tense
subtitles.example: I will be traveling by train.

subtitles.name: Zero conditional
subtitles.example: If ice gets hot it melts.

subtitles.name: Type 1 conditional
subtitles.example: If he is late I will be angry.

subtitles.name: Type 2 conditional
subtitles.example: If he was in Australia he would be getting up now.

subtitles.name: Type 3 conditional
subtitles.example: She would have visited me if she had had time.

subtitles.name: Mixed conditional
subtitles.example: I would be playing tennis if I hadn't broken my arm.
